DataElement.preferredName: Registration To Event Calculation Day Month Duration Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Calculation of the time (in days/months) from the registration of an individual to a clinical trial to another protocol-related event.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a protocol-defined event from the time or instance of registration or enrollment._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._Event; something that happens at a given place and time._The period of time during which something continues._The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.:Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:Event; something that happens at a given place and time.:The period of time during which something continues.

Concepts.definition: The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
Something that happens at a given place and time.
The period of time during which something continues.

Property.preferredDefinition: The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods.

Concepts.definition: The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._The period of time during which something continues._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.       :One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:The period of time during which something continues.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
The period of time during which something continues.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support Breast Oncology Local Disease (BOLD) Initiative.dmr.
